pages.text: 95|1|Yi wuhuaguo he ganlan guo mengshi,
95|2|yi xinai shan mengshi,
95|3|yi zhege anning de chengshi mengshi,
95|4|wo que yi ba ren zaocheng juyou zuimei de xingtai,
95|5|ranhou, wo shi ta bian cheng zui beilie de;
95|6|dan xindao erqie xing shan zhe, jiang shou buduan de baochou
95|7|cihou, ni zenme hai fouren baoying ne?
95|8|Nandao an la bushi zui gongdao de panjue zhe ma?
96|1|Ni yingdang feng ni de chuangzao zhu de mingyi er xuandu,
96|2|ta ceng yong xiekuai chuangzao ren.
96|3|Ni yingdang xuandu, ni de zhu shi zui zunyan de,
96|4|ta ceng jiao ren yong bi xiezi,
96|5|ta ceng jiao ren zhidao ziji suo bu zhidao de dongxi.
96|6|Jue buran, ren que shi beini de,
96|7|yinwei ta renwei ziji shi wu qiu de.
96|8|Wanwu biding zhi guiyu ni de zhu.
96|9|Ni gaosu wo ba!
96|10|Nage jinzhi wo de puren libai de ren;
96|11|ni gaosu wo ba! Ruguo ta shi zunxun zhengdao de,
96|12|huo shi ming ren jingwei de;
96|13|Ni gaosu wo ba! Ruguo ta shi fouren zhenli de, beiqi zhenli de,
96|14|nandao ta hai bu zhidao an la shi jiancha de ma?
96|15|Jue buran, ruguo ta bu tingzhi, wo yiding yao zhua zhu ta de e fa——
96|16|shuohuang zhe, fanzui zhe de e fa.
96|17|Rang ta qu zhaoji ta de huizhong ba!
96|18|Wo jiang zhaoji zai ba ni tianshi
96|19|jue buran, ni buyao shuncong ta, ni yingdang wei an la er koutou, ni yingdang qinjin an la.
